And Children Listen | Funny Christmas Photo Card

Review And Children Listen | Funny Christmas Photo Card – New Year Cards Funny Christmas Photo Card products with good quality, you can be confident Funny Christmas Photo Card Try to read more firstSend your holiday greetings in style with this simple and sweet Christmas photo card. Featuring festive florals and greenery with a snow overlay. Full frame photo on the front with the quote "tree tops glisten & children listen… to nothing… children literally don’t listen to anything". Add your choice of personalization to the back. This funny truthful card is sure to put a smile on anyone’s face.
Add your custom wording to this design by using the "Edit this design template" boxes on the right-hand side of the item or click the blue "Customize it" button to arrange the text, change the fonts and colors and to also add additional information or images to this design. Click "Customize Further" to open full editing options. If you need any coordinating items, (thank you cards, etc.) please contact me for a custom order.
****For custom requests you need my help with, do not place this merchandise in your cart. Instead, email me your request at [email protected] A link to your merchandise will be emailed to you once the item is available. You can use that link to place your order. Please allow up to 48 hours. Price:$2.00
